heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_kez
heroes.bio_loc: "I was born with a price on my head. As I got better at causing trouble, that price went up. Every time Queen Imperia raised the bounty, I knew I must have done something right. I think that's the worst part about being gone so long in Icewrack... I've got to get that price back up to a respectable number."
heroes.hype_loc: When it comes to strategy, Kez tends to wing it â€” he's able to swap on the fly between his katana and sai to slash, dash, swoop, and parry as the needs of the battlefield demand. But when he puts his mind to it, he can account for any eventuality, choosing the right tool to attack, escape or simply outwit his enemies with a little advance planning.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Flexible melee master with two sets of weapons and abilities

facets.description_loc: Kez always has a few fun tricks up his sleeve, but right now he's got a war to win. This facet doesn't do anything... yet.
facets.name: kez_default

abilities.name: kez_echo_slash
abilities.desc_loc: Kez slashes forward in a line with his Katana, dealing a percentage of his attack damage and a brief slow to targets in the area. After a short delay, the area is attacked again. Heroes take bonus damage.
abilities.lore_loc: Kez and his master Kraw have worked tirelessly to train the Kazurai new ways to keep the flyers off balance by improving upon ancient techniques.

abilities.name: kez_grappling_claw
abilities.desc_loc: Kez swings on a grappling hook towards the target unit or tree.  When the grappling hook collides with the target, that unit has slowed movement speed until Kez arrives. Upon landing, he attacks with %lifesteal_pct%%% lifesteal plus a flat bonus if the target is a Hero.
abilities.lore_loc: The Kazurai have the speed and reach to drag even the highest flyers from the skies.

abilities.name: kez_kazurai_katana
abilities.desc_loc: Katana attacks and abilities apply a stacking damage over time to enemies that deals a percentage of the original attack's damage as additional damage over time. Affected enemies have non-stacking reduced health regeneration.
abilities.lore_loc: To fight back against the reach of Imperia and her Queensguard, the Kazurai had to become skilled in the ways of attrition.
abilities.shard_loc: Kez may activate the ability to impale the target with his attack, briefly stunning himself and the target in place. The target's debuff bursts, removing it and causing the attack to deal bonus damage based on the stack amount.

abilities.name: kez_switch_weapons
abilities.desc_loc:
Kez switches between his Kazurai Katana and Shodo Sai.

He gains different attack capabilities and abilities based on the weapon equipped. The abilities level up together, and when an ability is used, the associated alternate weapon ability also goes on cooldown.

Switch Discipline cooldown decreases by %cooldown_reduction_per_level%s per Hero level.
abilities.lore_loc: As former followers of the Shodo, the leaders of the Kazurai Order can switch effortlessly between twin disciplines of martial mastery over sai and blade.
abilities.scepter_loc:
Casting any weapon ability refreshes the cooldown of Switch Discipline.

The first ability Kez casts %scepter_cooldown_timer% seconds after using Switch Discipline will not set its alternate weapon ability on cooldown.

abilities.name: kez_raptor_dance
abilities.desc_loc: Kez enters into an uncontrollable channel for %AbilityChannelTime% second, gaining debuff immunity and %magic_resist%%% magic resistance. If the channel completes successfully, Kez performs a series of deadly radial slashes around him that deal damage based on the max health of the target and heal Kez for a percentage of all damage dealt. Kez receives a strong dispel upon completion.
abilities.lore_loc: Unleash the inner fury of the Flightless to feast on the essence of your foes.

abilities.name: kez_falcon_rush
abilities.desc_loc: Kez gains the ability to rush towards enemy targets to deliver echoing secondary attacks.  While in this state, Kez has phased collision and an attack rate that is less affected by attack speed.
abilities.lore_loc: An ancient Shodo technique used to hunt faster aerial foes, stealing the advantage and delivering multiple attacks within a single flap of their prey's panicking wings.

abilities.name: kez_talon_toss
abilities.desc_loc: Kez throws a Sai at the target unit. The Sai detonates when it hits, dealing damage and applying silence to all enemies in the area.
abilities.lore_loc: The Shodo learned to rely upon distance and disorientation to survive against much stronger opposition.

abilities.name: kez_shodo_sai
abilities.desc_loc:
Kez's attacks and abilities with the Sai have a chance to Mark enemies. Marked enemies are slowed, and the next attack or ability damage from Kez gains True Strike and will stun the enemy and deal a critical strike, consuming the buff.

Kez may activate the ability to disarm himself, lock his facing, and parry attacks and attack effects from the targeted direction for %parry_duration% seconds. If an attack is parried from an enemy Hero in this way, that Hero is stunned and Marked, taking additional critical strike and stun when the debuff is triggered.

The sub-ability may be used to cancel the blocking early.
abilities.lore_loc: The Shodo may have lost their way, but Kez and the Kazurai can still use Shodo knowledge for the good of the people.
abilities.shard_loc: Passively grants %shard_base_movement_speed% movement speed, and an additional %shard_vuln_movement_speed% movement speed per Marked enemy.

abilities.name: kez_ravens_veil
abilities.desc_loc: Kez releases a wave of smoke that applies his Mark with Parry bonus to nearby enemies, briefly reducing their vision. Kez receives a basic dispel and gains bonus movement speed and invisibility until he attacks or casts a spell.
abilities.lore_loc: Eying either threat or opportunity, Shodo masters slip instantly into shadow to reset the terms of any engagement in their own favor.
